query: SELECT 'vacant_shops' as type, COUNT(*) as count FROM vacant_shops UNION ALL SELECT 'third_line_income' as type, COUNT(*) as count FROM third_line_income UNION ALL SELECT 'third_line_categories' as type, COUNT(*) as count FROM third_line_categories;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 21ksxipa4kLneoE.root --database 6yeAhZnHexQXKcGnnUhDLE --execute SELECT 'vacant_shops' as type, COUNT(*) as count FROM vacant_shops UNION ALL SELECT 'third_line_income' as type, COUNT(*) as count FROM third_line_income UNION ALL SELECT 'third_line_categories' as type, COUNT(*) as count FROM third_line_categories;
